1292200.name: Sound of Windshift sound track vol.001
1292200.description:
7 songs of Sound of Windshift 15 game music of WINDSHIFT and ONE SPECIAL SONG in this album.
○ Songs
1. You are in my dreams (English)
2. La batalla del país del fuego (Spanish)
3. Las Estrellas nacientes (Spanish)
4. Guerreros del país de fuego (Spanish)
5. La esperanza del país de fuego (Spanish)
6. KENRO my heart
7. Wind To Your Load

○Game music
5 cool battle musics. 10 great musics.

○Special songs
Be your own you
